name: Not Golf
description:
Not Golf is a simple and addictive puzzle game.

The goal is to unblock Doors by finding the yellow keys.

Not Golf comes with multiple characters, which makes you more interesting inside the game .

There are more than 100 doors you have to open, and discovering the way to find the keys, very Beautiful and remarkable level design inside the Not Golf game.

This game is really worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and addicted.

• Features •

• Constant updates of New Doors EVERY week!!
• Smash enemies, beat bosses, earn gold - it's that simple!
• Hours of entertaining and challenging casual puzzle games
• Climb the dungeon leaderboards - rewards await!
• Easy to learn, fun matching game mechanics
• Special powers for each character
• multiple characters.
• New obstacles
• It’s FREE!
